com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller

Class AddPolicySetController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller.AddPolicySetController

  • public class AddPolicySetController
extends java.lang.Object
    A session scoped, managed bean for user interfaces related to adding a new PolicySet instance.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Muhammad Sadiq Alvi <10besemalvi@seecs.edu.pk>, Arjumand Fatima <09bicseafatima@seecs.edu.pk>
